long_description: The lightweight women's Sanuk Spritzer Flip-Flops are kind to your feet so you can keep trucking along on your summertime strolls. Bubbler EVA footbeds provide a soft, massaging texture without any hard plastic bristles or irritating bumps. Raised column texture of footbeds enhances airflow to help keep feet dry. Rubber outsoles stand up to frequent wear. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly. Closeout.
short_description: The lightweight women's Sanuk Spritzer Flip-Flops are kind to your feet so you can keep trucking along on your summertime strolls.
